content.question: Directions: Suggested planning and writing time—35 minutes. Write an essay that: Has a relevant thesis. Addresses all parts of the question. Supports thesis with specific evidence. Is well organized. Analyze the development of the various forms of European socialism in the 1800s.

frqParts.text: Directions: Suggested planning and writing time—35 minutes. Write an essay that: Has a relevant thesis. Addresses all parts of the question. Supports thesis with specific evidence. Is well organized. Analyze the development of the various forms of European socialism in the 1800s.

topic.text: 6.7: Ideologies of Change and Reform Movements

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
